sentence.Network_en: Chris Robertson of Australia beat his compatriot Chris Dittmar in the final.
sentence.Network_cn: 澳大利亚的克里斯·罗伯逊在决赛中击败了自己的同胞克里斯·迪特马。

sentence.Network_en: He believes that he and his compatriot student are the future leader.
sentence.Network_cn: 他相信他和他同国的学生是未来的领袖.

sentence.Network_en: My dear compatriot, it is time that we did something for our country.
sentence.Network_cn: 亲爱的同胞们, 为国效劳的时候到了.

GRE单词分类总结之名词... ... 105. commuter: 坐公车上下班的人。 107. compatriot: 同胞，同国人。 108. composer: 创作者，作曲家 …
He Believed that he and his compatriot students were the future leaders ., 他相信他和他同国的学生是未来的领袖.

list.abs: former Lazio star Sergio Conceicao has urged the Biancocelesti to sign his Portuguese compatriot Pele from Inter Milan .前拉齐奥明星球员塞尔吉奥。康西卡奥敦促拉齐奥尽快从国际米兰签下他的葡萄牙同胞贝利。
Jack was one of his old compatriots ., 杰克是他的老伙伴之一.
... Overseas Compatriot Student Education 侨生教育 overseas compatriot 侨胞 ; 海外同胞 compatriot countrymen 同国人.
this print is organized " special report " column , meaning in mark this great history hour together with compatriots .本刊组织“非凡报道”专栏，意在与国人一起纪念这个伟大的历史时刻。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: from French compatriote, from late Latin compatriota (translating Greek sumpatriōtēs), from com- 'together with' + patriota (see patriot)

entry.def: Your compatriots are people from  your own country.

example.ex: Chris  Robertson of Australia beat his compatriot Chris Dittmar in the final.
example.tran: 澳大利亚的克里斯·罗伯逊在决赛中击败了自己的同胞克里斯·迪特马。

means.word_mean: 1. a person from your own country
